website_summaries.verdict: A pack of waterproof eyeliners with all day staying power for a bargain price.
pros: Truly all-day staying power, rain or shine
Available in black, charcoal, cocoa, aquamarine, and violet
Can be easily applied to the waterline as well
Pack of 2 sits at a low price point
cons: Some find the eyeliner difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Lost lashes, burned my lash line
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased at how well this stayed on... until my eyelids started to turn red and burn. I now have swollen eyelids, minor chemical burns along my lash line, and am losing lashes. This was all within 24 hours. The worst part was trying to remove it when my lids first started burning... even with makeup remover I had to scrub. I have sensitive skin, but have never had a reaction like this to an eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: This is what it looks like on me. I think it's pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine Mary

customer_reviews.title: Caution, pencil hurts cant get on
customer_reviews.text: Even if I was given this eyeliner free I'd still hate it. I ordered 2 colors cuz I saw its waterproof & I'd try it. Well if u can manage to get it on without scratch in ur eyeballs out with this hard pencil liner And if I was able to apply enuff layers so u can actually see color without crying from the pain, I'd b able 2tell if waterproof but never again will I buy that type pencil eyeliner (ouchie)
customer_reviews.author: Dyan Frost

customer_reviews.title: It might be good if only I could use it
customer_reviews.text: You turn the base to push out the eyeliner, but instead the plastic sheath (I believe it's designed to guide the eyeliner?) comes up with no product exposed. I've tried using fingers and eventually tweezers to pull the sheath off with no success. Essentially got one use out of this (product itself was good - if I could actually use it!).
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Not really Covergirl
customer_reviews.text: The product I was sent was a knockoff version of the Covergirl Ink It eyeliner. The picture I attached shows an original Ink It I purchased at the store on the right, and this product on the left. I would have no problem with this if it worked the same, but it is very cheap and breaks off while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Saar

customer_reviews.title: My Holy Grail Eye Liner
customer_reviews.text: The Cover Girl Ink It! eye liner is one of maybe two that actually stay on my eyes all day! I have the violet ink (emphasizes my hazel-green eyes) and I love it. I am so thrilled that I no longer need to reapply my eye liner multiple times throughout the day. I've tried SO many different formulas, brands, spent tons of money and very little and this less than $10 eye liner is the best. Way to go Cover Girl! And thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: TrixieFink

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I used to spend $25 on long lasting eyeliner from Sephora and I always tend to misplace it! Started buying this and I can handle to price to buy a few at a time to keep on hand (purse, car, office) for days I’m in a rush. Throw a little eyeliner on makes me feel more awake and groomed, with little work involved! I have this on a subscription (that’s how much I love and need this stuff). And it lasts like the expensive stuff... no need to reapply. Love!
customer_reviews.author: American Honey

customer_reviews.title: The product was very old.
customer_reviews.text: First of all it was obvious the eyeliner packaging was old, it was brittle and yellowed. The actual eyeliner was not good either. There was a tiny, clear tube sort of thing that the "crayon" part was in inside the pencil and the crayon wouldn't extend past that tube, so I couldn't use it. I tried cutting the tube to get to the crayon. I was able to get a tiny bit of the crayon out but it was very hard and sharp and hurt putting it on my eye, it did not glide smoothly and would not soften. Very disappointed. I would appreciate getting my money back. I can not use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Dauksch

customer_reviews.title: I can't even get it on
customer_reviews.text: I order this eyeliner on here all the time. Unfortunately, I ordered this one in advance so I didn't run out (September 30th) and it's too late to return but I can't even put it on! Something is wrong with it. It's like it turned into tar or something. It goes on very clumpy and clumped all of my eyelashes together. I got some on my fingers and it was like sticky. Not sure what's going on with it but I'm probably going to stop purchasing it from Amazon now on. Not sure if storage had something to do with it or what.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: It’s okayyyyyyyyy but not awesome
customer_reviews.text: I used ot buy Avon’s waterproof liner because it didn’t budge and was hoping for similar performance here. Not so much. This isn’t a bad liner- goes on easy (maybe even a little too soft, but I tend to smudge with a liner brush and sometimes apply a powder right over to soften the appearance, so that’s not necessarily a bad thing except when I want a sharper line), unfortunately it doesn’t seem to stay put. It’s a little toooo easy to remove for “waterproof”. I only use pencil as a back up for liquid liner so this isn’t an entire waste, but it could be improved upon greatly.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMom

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of eyeliner! I’ve been using eyeliner since I was about 12, and this fits the bill for me! You don’t have to sharpen it, it glides on easy and it is still somewhat of a solid texture versus a gel. What I mean by that, is that it doesn’t smudge or bleed like a traditional gel eyeliner. It’s my go to for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.author: TTran

customer_reviews.title: Broken mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to wear it. I opened the package, gently pulled off the lid, turned the pencil dispenser & the eyeliner did not come out to where I could apply it. It will not come out past the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B.

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn eye liner since I was a teenager (let's just say a long time ago) and after all these years, I FINALLY found an eye liner that doesn't smudge, is easy to put on and gives a perfectly defined line every time. This is the ONLY eye liner I would ever give 5 stars to and is the ONLY eye liner I will use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: No Exaggeration
customer_reviews.text: This has great staying power and the color is good, but this is "hard" (not "difficult") to apply. As in ... it doesn't go on smoothly or softly for me, but rather kind of drags and pulls like a rock on the sidewalk. I used to love it, but then I tried an exaggerated brand when CG was out of stock. I thought I could easily switch between the two, but it's not happening; there's just no comparison I'm keeping this CG one as a backup, but my brand preference is no exaggeration.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing.
customer_reviews.text: First off, the color is A LOT darker than what is represented in the listing. Second, the listing says it is waterproof. It’s definitely not and nowhere on the package does it say it’s waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: Meh...just okay
customer_reviews.text: This was just okay. I tried two colors, brown and black. It goes on pretty smoothly without having to press very hard. I haven't had any trouble with smudging or wearing off, but I do set my eyeliner with eye shadow so that's not usually a problem for me anyway. The only thing I really don't like - and this is a big thing for me - is that it can't be sharpened. After the initial one or two uses it goes on in a broad line which I don't like. The search for perfect eyeliner goes on...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero smudge!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched for years for an eye liner that doesn’t smudge onto my upper eye lid as soon as I open my eyes after application. Little did I know I should have been searching drug store brands instead of luxury brands. Seriously zero smudge! I have hooded eyes so every other liner I’ve tried transfers to my upper lid. This is the only one that hasn’t. I found it after my sister used hers to draw a deer nose on her face for Halloween and couldn’t wash it off with just water and a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Augustin

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tarte, Too Faced, MAC, Kat Von D etc
customer_reviews.text: Everyone always asks what kind of eyeliner I use, because it looks the exact same at the end of the 12hr workday as it did when I showed up. I’ve tried high performance brands like Tarte, Too faced, MAC, Kat Von D etc and NONE of them hold up like cover girl ink it. It’s consistency is almost like a gel liner but in an self sharpened mechanical form. It goes on smooth, stays there (even in the wet line) so no panda eyes, and isn’t shiny. This stuff is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: MFingUnicorn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a different packaging and formula than the Perfect Point Plus that I needed. I have sensitive eyes so I use Perfect Point Plus and it doesn't make my eyes water like crazy and get dry and puffy. I was excited to try this color. It came in a different package than my green PPP that I wear everyday, but I thought maybe they changed the packaging. My eyes got watery, dry, and puffy after applying this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wilmer-Chero

customer_reviews.title: Complsined!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the item, there was no inner black, just metal showing so I complained to Amazon and they very kindly sent replacements an did not require me to return the other (set of 2) so I opened it and found it was exactly the same as the other one! The replacements which were sent, Zi have opened one and it is perfect Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: decent overall, but price makes it a good deal
customer_reviews.text: have to reapply every few hours and I still use my emergency melted eyeliner make up remover towels I keep stashed in my purse for this very reason. it's better than some, but it's not the best at staying put. goes on very dark though, stays put for a few hours if indoors. but definitely is not sweat proof. but at this price, it's a good deal I can't pass up. got one for my purse and one for home. which I'll need, because within a few hours Im wiping it off my face.
customer_reviews.author: John Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this eyeliner! For years I used a L’Oréal eyeliner. I went to replace my old tried and true eyeliner one day, but the store I went to was out of it. So, I grabbed this to get me by. Well, I’m NEVER going back! This eyeliner applies like butter, stays in place, and doesn’t create those gross goopies in the corner of my eyes. It’s a great eyeliner and I’m so glad the store was out of my old one that day! Will be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: KrystalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The Violet Ink It came in a new improved formula that glides on!!!  LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for the violet ink it eye pencil being hard and worthless I was worried about ordering it. I decided to give it a try anyway and I am glad I did. It arrived and the packaging said new and improved formula with gel like consistency. I tried it out and it went on smooth and silky. Beautiful color! I'm so glad they fixed whatever problem was going on.
customer_reviews.author: Bellingham Sun

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner pencil makes the BEST eyebrow pencil ever!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend This pencil, which has a little collar around the lead to prevent breakage and never needs sharpening. This pencil makes extremely fine lines just like hairs; so it makes a perfect eyebrow pencil! I have a scar in my eyebrow with shiny skin That is impossible to cover with most brow products; but this one makes fine lines identical to the eyebrow hair that let me fill in this scar perfectly. I know that this is meant as an eyeliner; but get one in your brow color and give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner for years.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!! My original review was for a brow pencil. Accidentally pasted the review for that product here. Love this eyeliner. It glider on so smoothly and stays all day. I have Asian monolids, wear contact lenses, and my eyes water all the time. This eyeliner manages to stay put. Have been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!!! False advertising!!
customer_reviews.text: No where on the packaging does it say waterproof and the advertisement says waterproof. On the back of the product it even says it removes easily with soap and water. That’s annoying, I only bought this for a beach vacation where I was needing waterproof eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner by far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner by far! It's a true black and it goes on almost like liquid eyeliner. I reapply it only once to my lower eyelid, other than that it stays on all day long. I have not had any reaction to it either when I have accidentally slept with it on. It's easy to remove with a damp towel if you don't have eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: faruna

customer_reviews.title: An eyeliner lover's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eyeliner. I wear eyeliner almost every day and I loved this since the first day. I only ever wear eyeliner for up to 8 hours and it held very well for the duration of that time. It's easy to apply and easy to remove. I would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The two times that I wore this, I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The two times that I wore this, I had an allergic reaction. It took about 12 hours for it show up and it lasted for 3 days. I only put it on the lower lid and my eyes swelled up and went completely red. The morning after, they were sealed shut. Wish I could return it!!
customer_reviews.author: Blonde00

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner, it's waterproof, smudge proof., it doesn't flake off and lasts longer throughout the day than any other eyeliner I have tried. It's usually sold out in local stores in my color (black) thankfully I can get it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best smudge proof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner..it's smudge proof even in this extreme summer heat..But wipes off easy with soap and water..
customer_reviews.author: kindlefreak

customer_reviews.title: This eye liner pencil is the best I have used in recent years!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to be awake for 36 very stressful hours. I had applied this Covergirl Ink It! eyeliner first thing that morning and a day and a half later it was still in place, smudge free! So YES, I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO CG!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Cover Girl!!!! I wear liner on the lower part of my eyes. I have used the "perfect point plus" CG liner in black onyx for many years. The unique design of this liner is the BEST. It is easy to control and sharpens automatically with a click/turn of the pen. The KEY is the FINE tip. Recently, I tried the new "Ink It"----shown here. It is even better because the formula doesn't smear/smudge--even in hot weather or blinking ect.... The "perfect point plus" liner had some issues with smudging. I'm EXTREMELY happy with the new Ink It!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner !! Greater price !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product !! I tried maybeline tattoo eyeliner , total trash & waste of money !! This eyeliner is smudge free & water proof . My skin is oily but this eyeliner stays UNTIL I use make up remover 🙌🏼💚
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Harder to apply than the other cover girl style eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't go on as easily as the other cover girl style eyeliner with the clear tip. It takes a few more pass overs to really show up. It lasts about the same length of time as the other styles and brands I've used though. It definitely fades throughout the day but I haven't found an eyeliner that doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Cry, Sweat and Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress enough how amazingly durable this liner is, especially for the price! It creates solid lines. If you're like me, who is prone to sobby breakdowns, workouts without removing makeup, or constantly forgetting your umbrella on stormy days, then get this liner.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This liner did not live up to its' claims. First off. It wouldn't even transfer onto skin easily at all. I had to burn a bit of the end so that it would glide & repeat every use. Not the color I expected either
customer_reviews.author: Tyisha Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Bait n switch?
customer_reviews.text: What I’m disappointed about is that I purchased this product because it stated “waterproof “. The only kind I buy. When I received them, it does not say waterproof anywhere. Just long lasting. False advertising
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Landman

customer_reviews.title: Dry and hard
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with this! It doesn’t come out right..and what does come out is HARD AND DRY. I’m very disappointed bc I love purple. The other one I got..same product different color..is great. Too bad this one wasn’t great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought expensive eyeliners, and they break or won't stay on, this eyeliner works best for me, i apply once in the morning and it lasts all day, my favorite,i won't buy any other kind again
customer_reviews.author: kimberly kilburn

customer_reviews.title: Very irritating on the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I could not wear this eyeliner...I tried several times but every time it left a horrible film on my eyeball. It irritated my eyes so bad that I just couldn’t wear it. This is the first eyeliner I have worn that did this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DRY
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this eye liner is terrible! It’s completely hard and dry. It actually squeaks on paper!! It doesn’t even show up on my skin. SO DISSATISFIED!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Won't run when you're on the run
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best long wear liner I've ever used! I sweat and have a naturally oily face and I can work a full day, on the run and never worry if my makeup has it's own run. I dont take my makeup off before bed (I don't do full face so calm down) and 75% of my liner is in tact the next morning. Bonus hint: remember Sea breeze face astringent? Best waterproof makeup remover I've ever seen! Try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt richardson

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite eyeliner! You can put a little line or make your eyes stand out. Smudge proof!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable fine line, so cheap, probably best eyeliner pencil I be ever used. I've used them all, I have small eyes and this was better than thirty dollar eyeliner
customer_reviews.author: Barbie doll 7

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have always had trouble with eyeliner staying on as I rub my eyes a lot, but this eyeliner seemed to perform the best out of any I tried. I have since had my eyeliner tattooed on and no longer use it but I would still recommend this product to anyone who's eyeliner doesn't stay.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Waterproof Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried sooooo... many different eyeliners (probably 20-30) over the years and I FINALLY found one that's easy to use and it's waterproof! Now I don't have to check the mirror later in the day to make sure it's not smeared all over my eyes, especially after exercising. A lot of them say they're waterproof, but they're not! I'm buying enough to have as back up to make sure I never run out of it! No more searching for eyeliners again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not smudge proof at all, barely comes on black and because of that, you find yourself putting it on a number of times before it catches the color. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Glides On
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Pigment is dense and true Application is very smooth. One easy line and it’s on Will be looking at other colors
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Meh. An okay product, but I’m not in love.
customer_reviews.text: The liner doesn’t last as long in corners of the eye, but will last 24 hours if not rubbbed or touched too much. Not waterproof nor very resistant to water, but it handles sweat ok.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Last a while, but breaks off easily.
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner works great and lasts a long time, even in the waterline. But it breaks off sometimes and gets ruined! It's one that twists up inside a plastic tube, not a sharpened pencil liner. The liner itself is so fragile and has broken while trying to apply. Not worth losing my money when its happened every time to me.
customer_reviews.author: Username

customer_reviews.title: Good pencil if you don’t get a old one.
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is the best. I’m giving it 3 stars because I order Two and one pencil is dried n doesn’t work at all. I want my money back for that one pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Luz C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Pack- Only One Eyeliner Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time user of this eyeliner so I ordered the two pack. The first one was great- as advertised. The second (which I only recently discovered) was so dried out that it was more like hard plastic. I tried to use it and instead just scratched my eyelid. No color would come off! Very disappointing, especially since I didn't discover this issue until weeks later since the other eyeliner I was using was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Hated this! It was impossible to figure out how to get the pencil to come out, then it was so hard, it wouldn’t even show up on my skin, then it broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I’m just rough with my eye makeup, but I don’t feel like this lasts as long as it describes and it definitely smudges
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Trash!
customer_reviews.text: Worst eye liner ever. Hardly even inks on, it was so hard and dry!! I threw it into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite eyeliner...its almost permanent for the time you want it to be, but washes off nicely. Ive been looking for a long time for an eyeliner that doeskin give raccoon eyes when its hot out and I'm sweaty...
customer_reviews.author: D Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not very Waterproof at All
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I expected better. It smudges easily and can be just wiped off! Does not seem any better than a non-waterproof product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: Goo color
customer_reviews.text: I don't like my eyeliner to dark and this is a good med brown color. It does smudge on me but I live in a very hot climate so it might just be the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. I have green eyes, it goes beautifully with them. It is a good eyeliner. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a crap product
customer_reviews.text: Could not even apply this item to my eyes. Would not recommend this to anybody. Was a huge disappointment.The package was opened and it looked really old.
customer_reviews.author: margie nevins

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used for the price
customer_reviews.text: Better than any other eyeliner I've used. Little smudging, and lasts better than most. It's more expensive than the type you must sharpen, but you don't waste any because you expose only the tiny amount needed. (Any no splinters!) I've tried to save by using, as an eyeliner, the less expensive eyebrow pencils, but they cause eye irritation. This item could only be improved if the price was reduced. Look for a less expensive per unit purchase of multiples.
customer_reviews.author: T. Legge

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My favorite go to eye liner. Goes on easy and lasts pretty much all day. Stays on when swimming usually too
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Sigh...
customer_reviews.text: "Ink it" my a**! This does not work very well. Smudges and comes off as if it were a regular Dollar Store liner. No, I would not recommend this particular eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Rough Application no longer worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the recent purchase of this product, which I noticed is distributed (perhaps made) by Proctor & Gamble. It was different. It went on rough, which is not good for the gentle eye area. I loved this product before and would continue to buy if it wasn’t for this. I have decided to look elsewhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Redekopp

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: The liner just did not work. I waited for a few days and few more thinking that the stick did not glide due to the very cold weather(which was a little illogical to think of).It was a mere piece of plastic. Worst ever experience from Covergirl.I had to give a star to post this review, otherwise it does not deserve even one.
customer_reviews.author: Rujutanup

customer_reviews.title: Go-to eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Dependable eyeliner. I like to use it on my water line and it never irritates me like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: King in 4th

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner. Easy to apply and remove
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner. Easy to apply and remove, stays on all day at work, only need to reapply on the inside of my lashes if my eyes water.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This liner goes on great and looks good for a short amount of time. After an hour or less it because smudged and doesn’t look good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great non-liquid liner. Good for wet lining. Color looks good. Love not needing to sharpen it. Doesn't smear (on me). My new favorite drugstore liner.
customer_reviews.author: KrissyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: da best
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best - I mess up my makeup constantly and this lasts so long, even past the point where I give up and look like a raccoon. Stays on all day, and even has leftover in the morning if I'm too drunk to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: True to advertized
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled w eyeliner. This stuff truly is as advertised. I went swimming and it still adhered.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: First time using these but I’ll get them again, they last all day with little smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I’ve ever got ( it worked on my hand but Almighty seems scratched my eyelids when it was trying to apply). I first got this product elsewhere, loved it(!!), and though would get it again from Amazon. Unfortunately... WAIST of money. Too sad.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 Ink It pencils; one works beautifully (charcoal) but one is defective (violet). I spin and spin and the pencil will not come out. Seems almost like it was already at the end. Very disappointed, but I don't want to go through the hassle of returning it for $6.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B Carrk

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using covergirl makeup, this ink it eyeliner goes on smoothly but it smudges easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Survives all day with no smudge!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye liner ! I finally found a real smidge proof eyeliner. I can buy this at Walmart but with the stay home order I am glad I can still get my supplies delivered. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Howard

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite. Ran out and had to use liquid eyeliner. Ew. Lol doesnt bleed. I live in AZ. It gets hot. And this doesnt run down my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was dried out, couldn't use it

customer_reviews.title: Great liner
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to find in the stores,but I love it for tight lining. It glides on,and stays put,and does not irritate my eyes.

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use& I like that it’s waterproof. I cry a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've been off work, so not a lot of opportunities to use it, but so far I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner i have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this stuff! Easy to use! I use on watermark and it stays on all day!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like what I usually purchase in store, but convenient to grab from here!
customer_reviews.author: swillis

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine as far as self sharpening eyeliner goes, but i bought it because it was SUPPOSED to be waterproof. It was advertised as waterproof, and said its not supposed to budge. When it arrived, nowhere on the package did it say waterproof, and it "budges" just the same as my old eyeliner...
customer_reviews.author: Kim Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Stays put all day (12 hours and more)
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your mone!. I have bought two of these and they were both completely dried up. I don’t know if they were old and dry or if these are normally like that, but they wouldn’t even make a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays put even while exercising.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect application. Easy. Last all day til removal at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger C

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pencil applicator!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeliner because of the color. This shade of violet is lovely but the pencil itself is NOT the typical inkit! pencil. It is the old-fashioned covergirl click-click pencil that breaks and is super rough. It does not glide on smoothly like the typical inkit! pencil. I bought two to stock up and i am SOOO disappointed ☹️👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this eye liner. I've been searching for an eyeliner that doesn't wear off a few hours later.. or end up smudging above your eye. This eye liner wears well. It stays on all day. I never need to reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It doesn't smudge and is waterproof. Lasts all day. I sometimes fall asleep without removing it and in the morning it still looks great
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, stays on and is the right color.

customer_reviews.title: Scam! Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! This is a scam. Both items contained NO EYELINER! Just empty shells with nothing inside!

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty make-up ignorant, but this works well for me for everyday use at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Color is pretty though
customer_reviews.text: Was gone in minutes of wear and if you have sensitive eyes this may be one to avoid it made my eyes water all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of the 6 eye pencils were all dried up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered six of these eye pencils. The first one I opened and used was fine. I just opened a second one and it was all hard and would not work. I opened a third and same thing. After opening all six, only two seem to be usable. I wish I had know this when I first received the order because now I am out of the time frame to return them! Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha W

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Nice and black and stays put once its been on a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Covergirl Ink It! By Perfect Point Plus Waterproof Eyeliner, Black, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Color:BLACK INK| Size:2 CountAchieve a high-impact look with Ink It! By Perfect Point Plus Eyeliner from COVERGIRL. The self-sharpening pencil applies a rich, vibrant look that lasts 12 hours. There will be no skipping, dragging, pulling or tugging as you apply, thanks to the smooth applicator that gives you expert control. Best of all, it's waterproof, as well as crease and fade resistant, so your eye look will hold up all day, or night.
feature_bullets: Ink It! By Perfect Point Plus Eyeliner gives you pen-like precision that lasts for 12 hours
Waterproof formula enhances your eyes with bold, vibrant color
The self-sharpening pencil glides on easily, without skipping, dragging or pulling
This eyeliner has a perfect shade for any occasion and every mood
For the best look, use with COVERGIRL Eye Shadow Quads and Lash Blast Fusion Mascara

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
